entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 6:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: N 23 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
